name: write-property-request
description: Represents a request to write a single property value to a BACnet object, with optional array index and priority.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the BACnet object whose property is to be written.

fields.name: property-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the property to be written.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: The index within an array property, if applicable. Optional.

fields.name: property-value
fields.description: The value to write to the property.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: The priority of the write operation, if applicable. Optional.
